welcome.title: Welcome to TransSync!
welcome.description: We'll guide you through the main features of our transportation management system.

step1.title: Dashboard
step1.description: Here you'll find a complete overview of all your transportation operations, including active routes, available vehicles, and important statistics.

step2.title: Driver Management
step2.description: Manage all information about your drivers, including their profiles, licenses, trip history, and performance.

step3.title: Route Management
step3.description: Create, modify, and supervise all your transportation routes. Optimize routes and manage schedules efficiently.

step4.title: Vehicle Management
step4.description: Maintain complete control of your vehicle fleet, including maintenance, real-time location, and operational status.

step5.title: Schedules and Planning
step5.description: Organize and manage your route schedules, assign drivers and vehicles, and keep everything synchronized.

step6.title: Reports and Analytics
step6.description: Access detailed reports on your operation's performance, cost analysis, and efficiency metrics.

step7.title: Profile Settings
step7.description: Customize your experience by configuring your preferences, notifications, and personal data.

step8.title: Smart ChatBot
step8.description: Use our AI-powered virtual assistant to get quick answers about any system query.

step9.title: Real-time Notifications
step9.description: Receive instant alerts about important events such as delays, emergencies, or route changes.

step10.title: Theme Settings
step10.description: Customize the system appearance with light or dark themes according to your preference.

step11.title: Emergency Center
step11.description: Quickly access the emergency panel to report and manage critical situations.
